title: README.md
summary: Introduction to the Ergo Platform documentation. The documentation is hosted at docs.ergoplatform.com. Contributions can be made by submitting a pull request. To run the documentation locally, install the required packages using pip and then run the mkdocs serve command.

qa_pairs.question: What is the URL for the Ergo Platform documentation?
How can one contribute to the Ergo Platform documentation?
What command is used to install the required packages for running the documentation locally?
What command is used to serve the documentation locally?
What is the purpose of the Ergo Platform documentation?
qa_pairs.answer: To provide documentation for the Ergo Platform.

sections.heading: Running locally
sections.content:
Install required packages

```
python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
```

```
mkdocs serve
```
